title: Sirenia - Perils OF The Deep Blue (Limited Edition) mp3 320k ak6
description:
Sirenia - Perils OF The Deep Blue (Limited Edition) mp3 320k ak6103 What we got...Perils of the Deep Blue is the sixth full-length album by the Norwegian gothic metal band Sirenia. It was released on June 28 of 2013 in Europe, July 1st in the United Kingdom and July 9 in North America through Nuclear Blast.

Produced by Morten Veland, it was mastered and mixed by Endre Kirkesola at Dub Studios in Norway. The cover art is by artist Anne Stokes, and was discovered by Veland by chance via the Internet.Writing and recording

Ailyn joined a Norwegian choir in 2012 to get some training and also inspiration for the upcoming release.According to Morten, the writing process took two years. He began writing for the album before the release of their previous one.

Promotion

On May 7 of 2013, Sirenia released a studio trailer for their album via Facebook. On May 10, the band released their download single "Seven Widows Weep" through Amazon along with "Ditt Endelikt". The band released their second studio trailer showing the members photo shoot for the album on May 21 of 2013 through Nuclear Blast's YouTube channel. On June 3, Sirenia premiered their latest music video for their single.
